description_txt: stated on August 18, 2012 in in a story in the Chattanooga Times-Free Press:
quote_txt: "We have only one person on the (TVA) board, to my knowledge, who even has any corporate board experience."

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2012 in a news release:
quote_txt: "For Social Security, which is projected to remain solvent through 2033, Whitehouse has cosponsored [a bill that] . . . would extend the life of the program by an additional 75 years."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • August 26, 2012

description_txt: stated on August 18, 2012 in a speech at Windham High School in New Hampshire:
quote_txt: "His new running mate, Congressman Ryan, put forward a plan that would let Governor Romney pay less than 1 percent in taxes each year."

description_txt: stated on August 18, 2012 in a campaign stop at The Villages:
quote_txt: The Romney-Ryan plan for Medicare "does not affect" benefits for anyone 55 or older.

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2012 in a Web video:
quote_txt: The Obama administration "willfully leaked the existence of STUXNET (a computer worm used against Iran), allowing our enemies to learn more of our secrets and of our operations."

description_txt: stated on July 23, 2012 in a billboard:
quote_txt: The price of gasoline was at $1.85 a gallon when President Barack Obama took office and has since nearly doubled because of his policies

description_txt: stated on August 10, 2012:
quote_txt: Initial efforts to strip airport contractors of their special diversity status "has no effect" on the contracts or the city’s diversity goals.

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2012 in a campaign email:
quote_txt: Says Betty Sutton and House Democrats "gutted" Medicare by $741 billion to pay for Obamacare.

description_txt: stated on August 17, 2012 in a campaign commercial:
quote_txt: Paul Ryan’s Medicare plan "could raise future retirees’ costs more than $6,000."

description_txt: stated on August 16, 2012 in a statement.:
quote_txt: Says "cities save an estimated $38 in dental costs for every $1 invested in fluoridation."

description_txt: stated on August 21, 2012 in an advertisement aired in and around New Hampshire:
quote_txt: "Your Congressman, Charlie Bass, took over $166,000 from Big Oil."

description_txt: stated on August 18, 2012 in a speech in The Villages, Fla.:
quote_txt: Says Obama puts "15 unelected, unaccountable bureaucrats in charge of Medicare, who are required to cut Medicare ... that will lead to denied care for current seniors."

description_txt: stated on August 22, 2012 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: "Mitt Romney says class sizes don’t matter."

description_txt: stated on August 13, 2012 in a press statement.:
quote_txt: Says 88 Texas constables have died in the line of duty.

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2012 in a television ad:
quote_txt: Says U.S. Senate hopeful Tammy Baldwin voted for a $1 trillion stimulus bill that included a wasteful "$800,000 to replace light bulbs."

description_txt: stated on August 20, 2012 in a news conference:
quote_txt: "I haven't raised taxes in the time I've been the governor of New Jersey."

description_txt: stated on August 14, 2012 in a news release:
quote_txt: Says that as Massachusetts governor, Mitt Romney "condemned coal-fired plants, saying they kill people."

description_txt: stated on August 20, 2012 in a radio ad:
quote_txt: "In Florida, they're already talking about how the Ryan-Romney plan will end Medicare and replace it with a voucher."

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2012 in a web video:
quote_txt: The Obama administration "leaked information, deliberately or otherwise, that led to the identification of the Pakistani doctor that helped us in achieving our goals and killing bin Laden."

description_txt: stated on August 21, 2012 in a news release:
quote_txt: Says Congressmen Paul Ryan and Todd Akin co-sponsored legislation "to limit federal funding for abortion to victims of ‘forcible rape.’"

description_txt: stated on July 30, 2012 in a TV ad:
quote_txt: "I led the fight to require the Coast Guard to buy their engines from us, not foreign companies."

description_txt: stated on July 26, 2012 in a press release:
quote_txt:
"Clayton County Public Schools recently achieved a milestone that has eluded other
metropolitan districts across the state" by meeting federal guidelines for having a highly qualified staff.

description_txt: stated on August 11, 2012 in remarks:
quote_txt: "A small business in my district" needed "31 different permits and fees just to be able to expand."

description_txt: stated on July 26, 2012 in a TV ad.:
quote_txt: Tim Kaine supported "higher energy costs for families."

description_txt: stated on August 12, 2012 in a television interview:
quote_txt: Rep. Peter Petrarca "voted on two pieces of legislation that helped auto body shops ... and at that point I think there is a conflict of interest."

description_txt: stated on July 31, 2012 in a letter to constituents.:
quote_txt: Says an appointed board created under Obamacare "will have the ability to come between you and your doctor in determining the best treatment options for you!"

description_txt: stated on July 18, 2012 in a campaign email:
quote_txt: Says House Republicans spent $50 million on 33 votes to repeal Obamacare.

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2012 in an announcement:
quote_txt: On supporting the charter school amendment.

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2012 in an interview:
quote_txt: "Under the president's plan, he cuts Medicare by $716 billion, takes that money out of the Medicare trust fund and uses it to pay for Obamacare."

description_txt: stated on August 15, 2012 in a Web video:
quote_txt: "Days after the (Osama bin Laden) raid, Hollywood was invited into the White House so that they could receive a briefing" that revealed intelligence sources and methods.
